resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104377</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104377</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206646</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ben's Guide to the U.S. Social Sciences for Kids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anleitung Bens zu den VEREINIGTE STAATEN 
Sozialwissenschaften für Zicklein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le guide de Ben des sciences sociales des 
ETATS-UNIS pour des gosses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guia de Ben às ciências sociais de ESTADOS UNIDOS
para miúdos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guida del Ben alle scienze sociali degli STATI 
UNITI per i capretti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγός Ben για τις ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΕΣ κοινωνικές επιστήμες
για τα κατσίκια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guía de Ben a las ciencias sociales de ESTADOS 
UNIDOS para los cabritos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Helps K-12 students learn how our government works. Students can learn about the branches of government, the election process, and how laws are made. This includes debate topics, word puzzles, historical documents, and resources for parents and teachers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen K-12 Kursteilnehmer erlernen, wie unsere 
Regierung arbeitet. Kursteilnehmer können über die Zweige der 
Regierung erlernen, der Wahlprozeß und wie Gesetze gebildet werden. 
Dieses schließt Debattethemen, Wortpuzzlespiele, historische 
Dokumente und Betriebsmittel für Eltern und Lehrer ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants des aides K-12 apprennent comment 
notre gouvernement fonctionne. Les étudiants peuvent se 
renseigner sur les branchements du gouvernement, le procédé 
d'élection, et comment des lois sont faites. Ceci inclut des 
sujets de discussion, des puzzles de mot, des documents historiques, 
et des ressources pour des parents et des professeurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes das ajudas K-12 aprendem como nosso 
governo trabalha. Os estudantes podem aprender sobre as filiais 
do governo, o processo da eleição, e como as leis são feitas. 
Isto inclui tópicos do debate, enigmas da palavra, originais 
históricos, e recursos para pais e professores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi di aiuti K-12 imparano come il nostro 
governo funziona. Gli allievi possono imparare circa i rami del 
governo, il processo di elezione e come le leggi sono fatte. 
Ciò include i soggetti di dibattito, i puzzle di parola, i 
documenti storici e le risorse per i genitori e gli insegnanti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι οδηγίες Κ- 12 σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν πώς η 
κυβέρνησή μας εργάζεται. Οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να μάθουν 
για τους κλάδους της κυβέρνησης, η διαδικασία εκλογής, και πώς οι
νόμοι γίνονται. Αυτό περιλαμβάνει τα θέματα συζήτησης, 
τους γρίφους λέξης, τα ιστορικά έγγραφα, και τα στοιχεία 
συμπεριφοράς για τους γονείς και τους δασκάλους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes de las ayudas K-12 aprenden cómo 
nuestro gobierno trabaja. Los estudiantes pueden aprender sobre 
las ramificaciones del gobierno, el proceso de la elección, y cómo 
se hacen los leyes. Esto incluye asuntos del discusión, 
rompecabezas de la palabra, documentos históricos, y los recursos 
para los padres y los profesores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206646</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104377</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/bens-guide-to-the-u-s-social-sciences-for-kids</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
